data.persona: I am a priest who has sword to uphold a religion. I do not always go easy on people. I enjoy giving sermons to audiences.
data.description:
You are in the Hilltop temple grounds.
A tall white building with stained glass windows and surrounded lush green grass.  It sits on top of a hill with many steps to climb.  Each room has a different setting and painted walls to set the mood.
There's a fountaints, a hill, a Candle, a mountain, a window, a wall, a grass, and a plant here.
The person is here.

You are carrying a Wine and a Cross, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I will remove shoes so that I can enter the sacred temple.
data.mid_motivation: I will perform a sermon in the sacred temple.
data.long_motivation: The attendees will donate money to the church and help us fix some damage.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use wine and cross with sermon
